headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrials Did on Thursday
headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrials Did on Thursday

lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks recovered from an early slide to close modestly higher on Thursday, sending the Dow Jones industrial average and Standard & Poor's 500 index to new highs. The Dow has now eked out two record-high closes this week, while the S&P 500 has notched three. Investors were encouraged by good news on housing, the job market and corporate earnings.
